mapper.select: select distinct uo.orderid,uo.datetime,uo.ostatus, p.prophoto,p.procontent,p.proprice, d.color,d.psize, od.buyprice,od.onumber from product p,detail d,userOrder uo,orderdetail od,userInfo u where p.proid=d.proid and od.proid=p.proid and od.orderid=uo.orderid and uo.usid=u.usid and u.usid=#{usid} and uo.ostatus between 1 and 3
